Pachyderm | San Francisco | ONSITE, FULL-TIME | Lead Engineer

Love Docker, Golang, data infrastructure, and distributed systems? Pachyderm is building open source data infrastructure tools to compete with Hadoop. We love Kubernetes, containers, etcd, databases, and all the powerful distributed systems software being developed today so join us!

We're looking for our first hire (company is just founders right now). Smart, ambitious engineers who think there should be a better alternative to Hadoop. Our codebase is written in Go, but Go experience isn't required. We're very well-funded and offer strong salary along with significant equity.

Read more about about vision: https://medium.com/pachyderm-data/lets-build-a-modern-hadoop...
